channel.title: Slayer exp lamp
channel.description: Ok since theres no slayer on my server im trying to add this thing like a lamp for slayer you click on the lamp or right click use and you use it on another item how do it to make ti work on any item only items cause my people in the server is trying to get slayer up.

item.title: Slayer exp lamp
item.dc:creator: @kelly15 kelly15
item.description:
@kelly15 wrote:

i tryed doesnt work

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer exp lamp
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

[quote=“demonlover14, post:4, topic:338010”]Ohhhh, I think I understand what your wanting.
How to use a item on a item to get something?
Here’s the basics for detla base;

Not sure on the xp thing, but something like this would be for it.
if ((objectID == 3193) || (objectID == 4483) || (objectID == 2213) || (objectID == 2214) || (objectID == 3045)
|| (objectID == 5276) || (objectID == 6084) || (objectID == 14367) || (objectID == 11758)) {
skillX = objectX;
skillY = objectY;
WanneBank = 1;
}

		break;[/quote]

Use that format.

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer exp lamp
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Mr. Despair:

Just fix slayer or some people will be turned off if they just use a lamp.

Yes, some people like that some people don’t.
He should make atlest a coupl of npcs with slayer xp that are very hard sense he probably wont be able to code alot of them, along with the slayer lamps as rewards for a minigame or some sort.

Not sure on the xp thing, but something like this would be for it.

|| (objectID == 5276) || (objectID == 6084) || (objectID == 14367) || (objectID == 11758)) {
